isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR ARM ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR ARM ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Window Regulator Arm Assembly on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 145 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Position window regulator arm (Item 1) in behind the modular door hardware assembly (Item 2), line up the hole in the window regulator arm with the hole in the modular door hardware assembly. Install window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 3) through the modular door hardware assembly into the window regulator arm. Using a flat blade screw driver (Item 4) in the slot of the window regulator arm assembly shaft, rotate it clockwise to lock it in the window regulator arm, driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 145. Window Regulator Arm and Window Regulator Arm Assembly Shaft

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 53
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2) into slot of window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 5), driver side shown.

warning.para: To avoid personal injury, be sure to use an appropriate tool and use care when installing the window regulator assembly coil spring behind the retaining tab on the modular door hardware assembly per Step 3, since the window regulator assembly coil spring will be loaded during installation.

step1.para: Once the window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2) is installed properly on the window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 5). Using an appropriate tool, rotate window regulator assembly coil spring clockwise around to the retaining tab (Item 3) on the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and position behind retaining tab, driver side shown.
Rotate inner cab door handle (Item 1) back down over the window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 52
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position both retaining tabs (Item 3) on the inner cab door handle (Item 2) into the slots in the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and slide inner cab door handle to the left to secure retaining tabs in place, driver side shown.

Once the inner cab door handle (Item 2) is positioned properly. Install torx head bolt (Item 1) securing inner cab door handle to the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown. Tighten to 71 to 88.5 Lbf-in (8 to 10 N•m).

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 39
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Lower cab door glass (Item 1) to the bottom of cab door (Item 2).

Working through the cab door access opening (Item 5), carefully push window regulator arm (Item 7) into the cab door window slide block (Item 9) in the cab door window slide rail (Item 10), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 41
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is equipped with manual door window, temporarily place the window regulator handle (Item 1) on the window regulator handle shaft (Item 2) and raise and lower cab door glass (Item 3) in the cab door (Item 4). Make sure cab door glass goes up and down smoothly without binding before continuing. Once it is determined the cab door glass goes up and down properly, remove window regulator handle and continue to next step, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 39
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
If vehicle is equipped with electric door window, temporarily hold cab door trim panel (Item 4) up to the cab door (Item 2) and connect electric connectors (Item 3, Figure 35)
and use electric window switch panel (Item 3) to raise and lower cab door glass (Item 1) in the cab door. Make sure cab door glass goes up and down smoothly without binding before continuing. Once it is determined the cab door glass goes up and down properly, disconnect electric connector to cab door trim panel and continue to next step, driver side shown.

Install cab door window electric motor, refer to
CAB DOOR WINDOW ELECTRIC MOTOR
. For installing cab door window electric motor, refer to Install Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Install cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door window regulator arm and window regulator arm assembly shaft.
